title: bug failed to parse time string
body:
### expected behaviour
any error should appear by accessing to a folder whose name contains special characters

### actual behaviour
an error is shown, see logs, when we access to a folder with special characters

### steps to reproduce
1.     create a local folder on the system with german umlaut, i.e. /home/aeps/fã¶rderverein
 2.  add this folder as a local storage
 3.   open the ios app and load the folder and you get the error in the log 

### server configuration
opensuse 12.2 (x86_64)
apache2-mod_php5-5.3.15-1.16.1.x86_64
apache2-2.2.22-4.18.1.x86_64
samba-3.6.7-48.24.1.x86_64
owncloud-5.0.10-9.1.noarch
owncloud-3rdparty-5.0.10-9.1.noarch

### logs


#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
{"app":"php","message":"datetime::__construct(): failed to parse time string (-2099510672) at position 8 (6): unexpected character at \/srv\/www\/htdocs\/owncloud\/3rdparty\/sabre\/dav\/property\/getlastmodified.php#39","level":4,"time":"2013-08-21
```

#### suggestion to fix it
workaround:
add in this line:

$time = date("d-m-y h:i:s", strtotime($time));

http://forum.owncloud.org/viewtopic.php?f=23&t=10908

previously reported on https://github.com/owncloud/ios-issues/issues/108
thx @andreasernst
